vote.text: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S3930; text: CR S3930) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
